CssProperty.name: column-width
CssProperty.description: This property describes the width of columns in multicol elements.

entry.description: The width depends on the values of other properties.

CssProperty.name: column-count
CssProperty.description: Describes the optimal number of columns into which the content of the element will be flowed.

entry.description: Determines the number of columns by the 'column-width' property and the element width.

CssProperty.name: columns
CssProperty.description: A shorthand property which sets both 'column-width' and 'column-count'.

entry.description: The width depends on the values of other properties.

CssProperty.name: column-gap
CssProperty.description: Sets the gap between columns. If there is a column rule between columns, it will appear in the middle of the gap.

entry.description: User agent specific and typically equivalent to 1em.

CssProperty.name: column-rule-color
CssProperty.description: Sets the color of the column rule

CssProperty.name: column-rule-style
CssProperty.description: Sets the style of the rule between columns of an element.

CssProperty.name: column-rule-width
CssProperty.description: Sets the width of the rule between columns. Negative values are not allowed.

CssProperty.name: column-rule
CssProperty.description: This property is a shorthand for setting 'column-rule-width', 'column-rule-style', and 'column-rule-color' at the same place in the style sheet. Omitted values are set to their initial values.

CssProperty.name: break-inside
CssProperty.description: Describes the page/column break behavior inside the generated box.

entry.description: Neither force nor forbid a page/column break inside the generated box.
Avoid a page/column break inside the generated box.
Avoid a page break inside the generated box.
Avoid a column break inside the generated box.

CssProperty.name: break-before
CssProperty.description: Describes the page/column break behavior before the generated box.

entry.description: Neither force nor forbid a page/column break before/after the generated box.
Always force a page break before/after the generated box.
Avoid a page/column break before/after the generated box.
Force one or two page breaks before/after the generated box so that the next page is formatted as a left page.
Force one or two page breaks before/after the generated box so that the next page is formatted as a right page.
Always force a page break before/after the generated box.
Always force a column break before/after the generated box.
Avoid a page break before/after the generated box.
Avoid a column break before/after the generated box.

CssProperty.name: column-span
CssProperty.description: Describes the page/column break behavior after the generated box.

entry.description: The element does not span multiple columns.
The element spans across all columns. Content in the normal flow that appears before the element is automatically balanced across all columns before the element appear.

CssProperty.name: column-fill
CssProperty.description: In continuous media, this property will only be consulted if the length of columns has been constrained. Otherwise, columns will automatically be balanced.

entry.description: Fills columns sequentially.
Balance content equally between columns, if possible.
